00035 template<typename Point>
00036 long int BinarySearch(std::vector<Point *> &A, Point *q, zorder_lt<Point> lt) 
00037 {
00038         long int low = 0;
00039         long int high = A.size()-1;
00040         long int middle;
00041 
00042         while(low <= high)
00043         {
00044           middle = (low+high)/2;
00045           if(q == A[middle])
00046             return middle;
00047           else if(lt(q, A[middle]))
00048             high = middle-1;
00049           else
00050             low = middle+1;
00051         }
00052         return middle;
00053 }  
00054 
00055 template<typename Point>
00056 long int BinarySearch(std::vector<Point *> &A, Point *q, zorder_lt<Point> lt, unsigned long int &lb, unsigned long int &ub, long int length) 
00057 {
00058         long int low = 0;
00059         long int high = A.size()-1;
00060         long int middle;
00061 
00062         while(low <= high)
00063         {
00064           middle = (low+high)/2;
00065           if((high-low) <= length)
00066             {
00067               lb = low;
00068               ub = high;
00069               return middle;
00070             }
00071           if(q == A[middle])
00072             return middle;
00073           else if(lt(q, A[middle]))
00074             high = middle-1;
00075           else
00076             low = middle+1;
00077         }
00078         return middle;
00079 }

00081 template<typename Point>
00082 unsigned long int BinSearch(std::vector<Point> &A, Point &q, zorder_lt<Point> &lt)
00083 {
00084   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::iterator MyIt;
00085   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::size_type size_type;
00086 
00087   MyIt I = upper_bound(A.begin(), A.end(), q, lt);
00088                       
00089   return I-A.begin();
00090 }

00092 template<typename Point>
00093 unsigned long int BinSearch(std::vector<Point> &A, 
00094                             typename std::vector<Point>::size_type B,
00095                             typename std::vector<Point>::size_type E,
00096                             Point &q, zorder_lt<Point> &lt)
00097 {
00098   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::iterator MyIt;
00099   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::size_type size_type;
00100 
00101   MyIt I = upper_bound(A.begin()+B, A.begin()+E, q, lt);
00102 
00103   return I - A.begin();
00104 }

00116 template<typename Point>
00117 void PairBinarySearch(std::vector<Point> &A, Point q1, 
00118                       Point q2, zorder_lt<Point> lt, int &p1, int &p2) 
00119 {
00120   int low_q1=0;
00121   int low_q2=0;
00122   int high_q1 = A.size()-1;
00123   int high_q2 = A.size()-1;
00124   int middle = 0;
00125   int middle_store;
00126   
00127   p1 = -2;
00128   p2 = -2;
00129   
00130   while((low_q1 == low_q2) && (high_q1 == high_q2) && (p1 == -2) && (p2 == -2))
00131     {
00132       middle = (low_q1+high_q1)/2;
00133       if(q1 == A[middle])
00134         p1 = middle;
00135       else if(lt(q1, A[middle]))
00136         high_q1 = middle-1;
00137       else
00138         low_q1 = middle+1;
00139       if(q2 == A[middle])
00140         p2 = middle;
00141       else if(lt(q2, A[middle]))
00142         high_q2 = middle-1;
00143       else
00144         low_q2 = middle+1;
00145     }
00146   middle_store = middle;
00147   while(low_q1 <= high_q1)
00148     {
00149       middle = (low_q1+high_q1)/2;
00150       if(q1 == A[middle])
00151         break;
00152       else if(lt(q1, A[middle]))
00153         high_q1 = middle-1;
00154       else
00155         low_q1 = middle+1;
00156     }
00157   p1 = middle;
00158   middle = middle_store;
00159   while(low_q2 <= high_q2)
00160     {
00161       middle = (low_q2+high_q2)/2;
00162       if(q2 == A[middle])
00163         break;
00164       else if(lt(q2, A[middle]))
00165         high_q2 = middle-1;
00166       else
00167         low_q2 = middle+1;
00168     }
00169   p2 = middle;
00170 }

00173 /*
00174   This function executes a binary search on a vector of points
00175   \param A Vector of points to search
00176   \param q Query point
00177   \param lt A less_than comparetor
00178   \return If found: index of point. Otherwise: index of first smaller point
00179 */
00180 template<typename Point>
00181 long int BinarySearch(std::vector<Point> &A, Point q, zorder_lt<Point> lt) 
00182 {
00183         long int low = 0;
00184         long int high = A.size()-1;
00185         long int middle = 0;
00186 
00187         while(low <= high)
00188         {
00189                 middle = (low+high)/2;
00190                 if(q == A[middle])
00191                         return middle;
00192                 else if(lt(q, A[middle]))
00193                         high = middle-1;
00194                 else
00195                         low = middle+1;
00196         }
00197         return middle;
00198 }

00200 template<typename Point>
00201 unsigned long int BinarySearch(std::vector<Point> &A, Point q, 
00202                                zorder_lt<Point> lt, unsigned long int &lb, 
00203                                unsigned long int &ub, unsigned long int length) 
00204 {
00205         unsigned long int low = 0;
00206         unsigned long int high = A.size()-1;
00207         unsigned long int middle = 0;
00208 
00209         while(low <= high)
00210         {
00211                 middle = (low+high)/2;
00212                 if((high-low) < length)
00213                   {
00214                     lb = low;
00215                     ub = high;
00216                     return middle;
00217                   }
00218                 if(q == A[middle])
00219                         return middle;
00220                 else if(lt(q, A[middle]))
00221                         high = middle-1;
00222                 else
00223                         low = middle+1;
00224         }
00225         return middle;
00226 }
00228 /*
00229   This function executes a binary search on an array of points
00230   \param A pointer to head of array
00231   \param size size of array
00232   \param q Query point
00233   \param lt A less_than comparetor
00234   \return If found: index of point. Otherwise: index of first smaller point
00235 */
00236 template<typename Point>
00237 long int BinarySearch(Point *A, long int size, Point q, zorder_lt<Point> lt) 
00238 {
00239         long int low = 0;
00240         long int high = size-1;
00241         long int middle = 0;
00242 
00243         while(low <= high)
00244         {
00245                 middle = (low+high)/2;
00246                 if(q == A[middle])
00247                         return middle;
00248                 else if(lt(q, A[middle]))
00249                         high = middle-1;
00250                 else
00251                         low = middle+1;
00252         }
00253         return middle;
00254 }

00256 template<typename Point>
00257 class BinaryShortSearch
00258 {
00259   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::size_type size_type;
00260   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::iterator MyIt;
00261   typedef typename std::vector<MyIt>::iterator MyPIt;
00262 public:
00263   std::vector<MyIt> samples;
00264   zorder_lt<Point> lt;
00265   
00266   BinaryShortSearch()
00267   {
00268   }
00269 
00270   void init(std::vector<Point> &points, int sample_size=128)
00271   {
00272     samples.resize(sample_size);
00273     __srand48__(time(0));
00274     
00275     for(int i=0;i < sample_size;++i)
00276       {
00277         size_type s = __drand48__() * (double) points.size();
00278         samples[i] = points.begin() + s;
00279       }
00280     sort(samples.begin(), samples.end(), lt);
00281   }
00282 
00283   unsigned long int BinSearch(std::vector<Point> &A, Point &q, zorder_lt<Point> LT)
00284   {
00285     MyPIt U = upper_bound(samples.begin(), samples.end(), q, LT);
00286 
00287     MyIt LI, UI;
00288     if(U == samples.begin()) LI = A.begin();
00289     else LI = *(U-1); 
00290     if(U == samples.end()) UI = A.end();
00291     else UI = *U;
00292 
00293     MyIt I = upper_bound(LI, UI, q, LT);
00294     return  I-A.begin();
00295   }
00296 };
